mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_video (video_id, video_link, video_title, create_time, last_update, status, admin_id) values (#{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update enterprise_video set video_link = #{videoLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select video_id, video_link, video_title, create_time, last_update, status, admin_id from enterprise_video
